name: lambda-bonder-transaction-validation
description: Tools to add bonder validation to AWS Lambda
author: Authereum Labs, Inc.

scripts.generate-validation-zip: rm -rf lambdaBonderTransactionValidation.zip && zip -r lambdaBonderTransactionValidation.zip index.js validationConfig node_modules
scripts.generate:mainnet-dai: node generateZip.js mainnet dai && npm run generate-validation-zip
scripts.generate:testnet-all: node generateZip.js testnet all && npm run generate-validation-zip
